QuestionJSON.Question:
Skyler is working on their robotics project and is trying to analyze data related to the robot's battery life in hours over different terrains. They have determined the following battery life for each terrain: Sand: 2.5 hours, Grass: 4 hours, Concrete:6 hours.

What type of chart is most appropriate to display this data?
QuestionJSON.Answer4: Any of the above would be appropriate
QuestionJSON.Explanation: Bar charts are most appropriate for displaying data for elements of different types.
QuestionJSON.Code_Snippet:
1data.Add("Sand", 2.5)
2data.Add("Grass", 4)
3data.Add("Concrete", 6)
4Chart chart
5chart.Add(data)
6chart.SetTitle("Robot's Battery Life on Different Terrains")
7chart.SetXTitle("Terrains")
8chart.SetYTitle("Battery Life (hours)")
9chart.Draw()
